(11010100000)_2_∗2^(−3)  + (332545)_8_ ∗ (8)_10_ – (FEEF)_16_

(11010100000)_2_∗2^(−3)
= (11010100)_2_
= 1*128 + 1*64 + 0 + 1*16 + 0 + 1*4 + 0 + 0
= 128 + 64 + 16 + 4
= 22

(332545)_8_
= 3*8^5 + 3*8^4 + 2*8^3 + 5*8^2 + 4*8 + 5
= 111973

111973*8
= 895784

(FEEF)_16_
= 15*16^3 + 14*16^2 + 14*16 + 15
= 65263

   212 +
895784 -
 65263 =
830733
